data.title: Miranda Lambert to Perform at the Illinois State Fair
data.meta_description: Another huge country artist was just announced for the Illinois State Fair.
data.text:
Another huge country artist was just announced for the Illinois State Fair.

Miranda Lambert will be joining already announced Keith Urban and Jordan Davis at the Illinois State Fair Grandstand stage. She will be performing August 17 and tickets go on sale Saturday, March 23rd.

The Illinois State Fair is not holding anything back this year. Already announced for the 2024 fair include

Keith Urban - August 9th

Motley Crue - August 10th

Jason Isbell & the 400 Unit w/Ashley McBryde - August 11th

Jordan Davis - August 13th

Jonas Brothers - August 15th

Miranda Lambert - August 17th

With a few more dates to still be added to the grandstand, you have to wonder who else will they fair get. Miranda has been working on new music including a new single she has out with Enrique Iglesias called "Space in My Heart."

General Ticket Information

A reminder that admission is not included in tickets for the grandstand and beware of scammer they are out there. Only purchase tickets through ticketmaster.com and make sure you read all the details before purchasing the tickets.

The Illinois State Fair will kick off its 2024 season on August 8th and run through the 18th. With more spots to fill we can't wait to find out who's coming next. Maybe this will be the year I finally go to a state fair.
